meta.title: Wonder Corporate | Corporate Experiences in Colombia
meta.description: Team building, incentive trips, and corporate experiences designed to transform teams. +50 companies trust us.

hero.subtitle: Wonder Corporate
hero.title: Corporate experiences that transform teams
hero.description: We design trips and activities that strengthen culture, reward talent, and build real connections across your team.

pillars.title: Why Wonder Corporate?
pillars.description: We combine tourism expertise with organizational development to create experiences that make an impact.

teamBuilding.title: Team Building
teamBuilding.description: Scientifically designed activities to strengthen bonds, improve communication, and increase engagement.

adventure.title: Adventure & Nature
adventure.description: Outdoor experiences that challenge, inspire, and build shared memories. From hiking to extreme sports.

logistics.title: Full Logistics
logistics.description: We handle everything: transport, lodging, meals, and coordination. You only need to enjoy.

services.title: Our corporate services
services.description: Comprehensive solutions for every business need.

teamBuilding.title: Team Building
teamBuilding.description: Activities designed to strengthen team cohesion, improve communication, and create lasting bonds.

incentives.title: Incentive Trips
incentives.description: Reward your team with memorable experiences that celebrate achievements and motivate new goals.

logistics.title: End-to-end logistics
logistics.description: We handle every detail: transportation, lodging, meals, and activities.

stats.title: Results that build trust
stats.description: Our numbers reflect the commitment we bring to every company we serve.

testimonials.title: Companies that trust us
testimonials.description: What leaders say after living the Wonder Corporate experience.

items.quote: The team-building trip exceeded every expectation. Our team came back more united and motivated than ever.
items.author: Laura Mendez

items.quote: The attention to detail is impressive. Every activity was designed around our team-building goals.
items.author: Andres Vargas

items.quote: Professional, flexible, and creative. They have run our incentives for 3 years in a row.
items.author: Patricia Lopez

contact.title: Ready to transform your team?
contact.description: Tell us about your company and let's design the perfect experience together.

meta.title: Wonder Groups | Academic Trips for Universities
meta.description: Transformative academic trips for MBA, LLM, and MPA programs from top universities worldwide. 15+ years of experience, 7,000+ travelers.

hero.subtitle: Wonder Groups
hero.title: Academic trips that transform perspectives
hero.description: We design immersive experiences for MBA, LLM, and MPA programs at the world's most prestigious universities. Every trip is a unique learning opportunity.

pillars.title: Why Wonder Groups?
pillars.description: More than 15 years creating academic experiences that blend learning, networking, and adventure.

support.title: 24/7 support
support.description: Dedicated team available at all times. Full coordination from planning through the last day.

unique.title: Unique experiences
unique.description: Exclusive access to companies, institutions, and spaces not available to the general public.

safety.title: Guaranteed safety
safety.description: Certified safety protocols, full insurance, and contingency plans for every group.

programs.title: Academic programs
programs.description: We tailor experiences to each academic program, understanding the unique needs of every discipline.

mba.title: MBA
mba.subtitle: Master in Business Administration
mba.description: Immersive trips combining visits to leading companies, executive networking, and unique cultural experiences.

llm.title: LLM
llm.subtitle: Master of Laws
llm.description: Experiences designed for future lawyers, including visits to courts, international firms, and multilateral organizations.

mpa.title: MPA
mpa.subtitle: Master in Public Administration
mpa.description: Programs focused on public policy with access to government institutions, think tanks, and social impact projects.

stats.title: Numbers that speak for us
stats.description: Results that reflect our commitment to excellence.

logos.title: Universities that trust us
logos.description: We collaborate with the world's most prestigious academic institutions.

gallery.title: Transformative moments
gallery.description: Every trip is a chance to create connections that transcend borders.

certifications.title: Certifications & recognitions
certifications.description: We meet the highest standards of quality and safety.

items.name: TourCert
items.description: International certification for sustainable and responsible tourism.

items.name: Peace Commitment Seal
items.description: Recognition for contributing to communities affected by conflict.

items.name: ACOTUR
items.description: Member of the Colombian Association of Responsible Tourism.

items.quote: The organization was impeccable. Our students accessed experiences they would never have achieved on their own.
items.author: Maria Gonzalez

items.quote: Wonder Travel understands the specific needs of each academic program. The level of planning detail is outstanding.
items.author: Carlos Rodriguez

items.quote: We've worked with them for 5 years and every trip tops the previous one. True experts in academic travel.
items.author: Ana Martinez

contact.title: Planning an academic trip?
contact.description: Tell us about your group and let's design a transformative experience together.
